name: Aroa
description:
Aroa is a first person horror game inside of a haunted mansion where you seem to have no clue where you are and it is dark all around you. You feel a disturbing presence however, and you know you must be quick in order to escape. Make sure to keep rewinding the clock to buy yourself an extra couple minutes. Failure to do so will result in some...bad times.

This is a submission to Brackeys Jam 2020.2

CREDITS

Music by Avia.ai.

Textures by textures.com

Programming: Zaidis, ZAG852.

Art: Zaidis, ZAG852, Benevolent Whale

Voice Actors: Zaidis, Squid
